Detailed Description

This class guides vessels through the treacherous domain of chunk space navigation.

Each instance caches recent data so similar searches can reuse previous effort.

bool Navigator::findFullPath ( const NavLoc &  src,
const NavLoc &  dst,
float  maxSearchDistance,
bool  blockNonPermissive,
Vector3Path &  waypointPath 
) const

This method finds the complete path between the source position and the destination position, and fills the waypoint path.

It does not clobber the cache for this Navigator.

Parameters:
src The source position.
dst The destination position.
maxSearchDistance The maximum search distance.
blockNonPermissive Whether to take into account non-permissive portals.
waypointPath The Vector3Path which will be filled with the positions for the full path.

bool Navigator::findPath ( const NavLoc &  src,
const NavLoc &  dst,
float  maxSearchDistance,
bool  blockNonPermissive,
NavLoc &  nextWaypoint,
bool &  passedActivatedPortal 
)

Find the path between the given NavLocs.

They must be valid and distinct.

Note:
The NavLoc returned in 'nextWaypoint' should be handled with care, as it may only be semi-valid. Do not pass it into any methods without first verifying it using the 'guess' NavInfo constructor. For example, do not pass it back into findPath without doing this.
Parameters:
src The source position.
dst The destination position.
maxSearchDistance The maximum search distance.
blockNonPermissive Whether to take into account non-permissive portals.
waypointPath The Vector3Path which will be filled with the positions for the full path.
Returns:
true if a way could be found, false otherwise.

void Navigator::getCachedWaypointPath ( Vector3Path &  vec3Path  ) 

This returns the cached waypoint path.

If the destination point was in a different chunk, this will be only to the edge of the source point's waypoint set. If there was no cached path, vec3Path will be empty.

int Navigator::getWaySetPathSize (  )  const

This method returns the number of elements in the waypoint set path currently cached.
